snippet: Activists and some of California's top financiers, in an unusual alliance, have come together in an effort to enlist minority voters to defeat the repeal of California's global warming law.

headline.main: Cocktails and Fist-Pumping: California's Ballot Battle

abstract: Activists and some of California's top financiers, in an unusual alliance, have come together in an effort to enlist minority voters to defeat the repeal of California's global warming law.
